name: ACE (Darylsteak)
description:
Note: shooting the balloons marked S will give you a random temporary boost, ranging between temporary invincibility (you will turn light blue), a full repair or upgraded guns.

Made for the MY.GAMES Hyper-Casual Jam 2020. I originally planned to make 2 levels and a menu system but art took a lot longer than expected.

All art was made within the 3 days except for the explosion.

Credit for music from sawsquarenoise: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise/Towel_Defence_OST

Controls:

Keyboard:

WASD/Arrow keys to move

Space to shoot

Phone:

Hold and with 1 finger to move, that place you started becomes the center of the joystick.

Press the green button to shoot.
